plot: Making Magic explores the process of creating the magical parade floats seen in the Parade of Roses in Pasadena, California. Float supervisor and decorated Cindy Diaz shows us how it's done...
title: Making Magic: A Float Maker's Story
plot_es: Making Magic explores the process of creating the magical parade floats seen in the Parade of Roses in Pasadena, California. Float supervisor and decorated Cindy Diaz shows us how it's done...
original_name: Making Magic: A Float Maker's Story
